name: Love In Danger
description:
It's a middle earth, open world , role-play game

We can interaction the other people and write our story

We have a bar in the right side that bar show us how much are us a trustable

Go download and ride horse and jump in the advanture

Medium or Hight quality are recommended

We have 5 missions right now but the new one is coming soon(Work In Progress)

W-A-S-D (Horse and character controller)

Press "G" and talk the other peoples

Press "F" and mount a horse

Press "T" and open mission line
